register.description: Asynchronous Memory Bank Select Control Register

register.def-comment: DDR BankRead and Write Count Registers

register.name: PIXC_CTL
register.description: Overlay enable, resampling mode, I/O data format, transparency enable, watermark level, FIFO status

register.name: PIXC_PPL
register.description: Holds the number of pixels per line of the display

register.name: PIXC_LPF
register.description: Holds the number of lines per frame of the display

register.name: PIXC_AHSTART
register.description: Contains horizontal start pixel information of the overlay data (set A)

register.name: PIXC_AHEND
register.description: Contains horizontal end pixel information of the overlay data (set A)

register.name: PIXC_AVSTART
register.description: Contains vertical start pixel information of the overlay data (set A)

register.name: PIXC_AVEND
register.description: Contains vertical end pixel information of the overlay data (set A)

register.name: PIXC_BHSTART
register.description: Contains horizontal start pixel information of the overlay data (set B)

register.name: PIXC_BHEND
register.description: Contains horizontal end pixel information of the overlay data (set B)

register.name: PIXC_BVSTART
register.description: Contains vertical start pixel information of the overlay data (set B)

register.name: PIXC_BVEND
register.description: Contains vertical end pixel information of the overlay data (set B)

register.name: PIXC_RYCON
register.description: Color space conversion matrix register. Contains the R/Y conversion coefficients

register.name: PIXC_GUCON
register.description: Color space conversion matrix register. Contains the G/U conversion coefficients

register.name: PIXC_BVCON
register.description: Color space conversion matrix register. Contains the B/V conversion coefficients

register.name: PIXC_CCBIAS
register.description: Bias values for the color space conversion matrix

register.name: L1DADABL
register.description: L1 Data Bank A Memory Disable.

register.name: L1DBDABL
register.description: L1 Data Bank B Memory Disable.
